const posts = [ { title: 'Enforcing the Truths you WANT Interviewers to See in You', href: 'articles/enforcing-truths-you-want-interviewers-see', description: 'As humans, we have senses. We have memory. And we have a way of connecting every current experience to something from our past, to give context for how we should behave in the present situation.', date: 'Mar 16, 2020', datetime: '2020-03-16', }, ] export default function Articles() { return (

Articles

{posts.map((post) => (
{/*

{post.date}

*/}

{post.title}

{post.description}
Read full story
))}
) }
